revised_title: Anatomy and Affinities of the Family of Medusae
tldr: The author, Henry Huxley, investigates the anatomy and affinities of the Medusae family, providing a comprehensive view of the class and its relations with other families. He observes the structure of Medusae organs, their generative organs, and their affinities with other zoophytes, such as Hydroid and Sertularian Polyps.
